titles.title: Providing for the hour of meeting of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/3/1996--Introduced. Fixes the daily hour of meeting for the House of Representatives: (1) through May 11, 1996, at 2 p.m. on Mondays, 11 a.m. on Tuesdays and Wednesdays, and 10 a.m. on all other days of the week; and (2) from May 13, 1996, until the end of the second session, at noon on Mondays, 10 a.m. on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays, and 9 a.m. on all other days of the week.
